methods.name: startUpload

args.name: numBoxes
args.desc: The number of boxes that the data will take up

args.name: endBoxSize
args.desc: The size of the last box

args.name: mbrPayment
args.desc: Payment from the uploader to cover the box MBR

methods.desc: Allocate boxes to begin data upload process

methods.name: upload

args.name: boxIndex
args.desc: The index of the box to upload the given chunk of data to

args.name: offset
args.desc: The offset within the box to start writing the data

methods.desc: Upload data to a specific offset in a box

methods.name: startDelete
methods.desc: Starts the deletion process for the data associated with a DID

args.name: boxIndex
args.desc: The index of the box to delete

methods.name: updateApplication
methods.desc: Allow the contract to be updated by the creator

methods.name: dummy
methods.desc: Dummy function to add extra box references for deleteData.Boxes are 32k, but a single app call can only inlcude enough references to read/write 8kat a time. Thus when a box is deleted, we need to add additional dummy calls with boxreferences to increase the total read/write budget to 32k.
